hymn.title: How sweet, how heav'nly is the sight

layout.singingstanza: How sweet, how heav'n -- ly is the sight, When those who love the Lord In one an -- oth -- er's peace de -- light, And so ful -- fill His Word:

lyrics.stanza: How sweet, how heav'nly is the sight, When those who love the Lord In one another's peace delight, And so fulfill His Word:
When, free from envy, scorn and pride, Our wishes all above, Each can his brother's failings hide, And show a brother's love;
When love, in one delightful stream, Through every bosom flows; When union sweet, and dear esteem, In every action glows.
Love is the golden chain that binds; The saints Thy grace thus prove. And he is glory's heir that finds His bosom glow with love.
